events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen is cracked and unusable. I need help with this issue immediately.
The issue has been categorized as Product Defect due to the damaged laptop screen reported by the customer.
A technical support representative has been assigned to address the customer's concern regarding the damaged item.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your laptop arrived damaged. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and the packaging so we can understand the damage better?
I have attached photos of the broken screen and packaging as requested. The damage seems severe and I need a quick replacement.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement laptop immediately, and please keep the damaged item for our courier to pick up.
Thanks for your prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick handling of my issue and look forward to the replacement.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours. We consider this issue resolved on our end.
We are checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that everything is in perfect condition.
I received the replacement laptop and it is in excellent condition. Thank you very much for the excellent support.
The case has been closed successfully following confirmation of resolution and customer satisfaction.
